ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Spiffy, I m an unwise player. Guess we can t all be as wise as you. I m not going to bother debating your reply as I addressed all of your points in my
ygData.messageBody:
> > example closely, you'll note that only the first pass was my
> > "run through the zone". The others were me trying to recover
>
> I'd have to question the wisdom of your actions them. The
> first thing I would've done since you weren't successful at
> getting a bind in Highpass, is run to Qeynos and request a
> bind there. Yam it up with a sob story about being killed by
> Chief Goonda while bound in Freeport. I'd have to say 3 of
> your Freeport->Karana runs were self-inflicted.

Spiffy, I'm an unwise player. Guess we can't all be as wise
as you. I'm not going to bother debating your reply as I
addressed all of your points in my original example. As for
runs being self-inflicted, you got me. I just love to die
and run around naked so much that I do it intentionally as
far away as I can.

Just call me the streak..
